title: New Park Opening 🌳
description: The community park near Main Street is now open with new swings and benches.

title: Street Cleaning 🚮
description: The streets in Sector 5 will be cleaned tomorrow from 6 AM to 10 AM.

title: Community Yoga Event 🧘‍♂️
description: Join us at the central park for a morning yoga session this Saturday.

title: Water Supply Maintenance 💧
description: Water supply will be interrupted in Sector 3 for maintenance on Friday.

title: Road Repair Work 🛠️
description: Pothole repairs on Elm Street starting Monday morning.

title: Neighborhood Cleanup Day 🧹
description: Volunteers needed for cleaning the park and streets this Sunday.

title: Community Book Exchange 📚
description: Bring your old books and exchange them with others at the library.

title: Traffic Signal Issue 🚦
description: The traffic signal at Main & 3rd Street is malfunctioning, please drive carefully.

title: Community Health Camp 🏥
description: Free health checkups at the community hall on Saturday.

title: New Street Lights Installed 💡
description: Street lights installed on Oak Street for better safety at night.
